author: @libero_official
title: Beve un caffè alla macchinetta: finisce in terapia intensiva, bevanda contaminata – Libero Quotidiano
text:
25 aprile 2024 a a a Un grave episodio. Non si può definire in altro modo quanto accaduto a una ragazza di 21 anni che è finita in terapia intensiva a causa diuna gravissima reazione allegrica dopo aver bevuto solo un caffè . A quanto pare la bevanda o il bicchiere da cui ha bevuto sarebbe stato contaminato da insetti. L'acquisto del caffè è avvenuto in un distributore automatico all'aeroporto di Son San Joan a Palma di Maiorca.
Immediatamente tutto è stato denunciato alla polizia spagnola che adesso indaga per reato con la salute pubblica e anche per lesioni colpose. La ragazza, una dipendente di una compagnia aerea, ha deciso di concedersi un caffè insieme ai colleghi.
Appena ha preso il bicchiere tra le mani e ha buttato giù qualche sorso, la ragazza ha sentito immediatamente in bocca uno strano sapore. E di fatto in pochi secondi si è resa conto che nel bicchiere c'erano diversi insetti. Qualche istante dopo è stata colta da uno choc anafilattico.In pochi secondi il suo viso ha cominciato a gonfiarsi. È stata immediatamente curata dai servizi sanitari dell'aeroporto che le hanno somministrato adrenalina e altri farmaci per stabilizzarla. Poi il trasferimento in ospedale in terapia intesiva . Dopo una notte di ricovero la ragazza si è ripresa e di questa storia è rimasta solo la paura. Ma di certo la storia non finsice qui. L'azienda che gestisce i distributori dovrà dare parecchie spiegazioni.

author: Isak Dinesen
title: Several making most of new snow through downhill options | Top Stories | waow.com
text: WAUSAU, Wis. (WAOW) -- As much as this round of snow may be a hindrance on driving, it's not dulling spirits in Marathon County. Many people utilized their snow day to go downhill at Granite Peak in Rib Mountain or Sylvan Tubing Hill in Wausau. "Well, school got canceled, and what better to do in Wisconsin when it's snowing like this?" said Braxton Meyer of Colby, who visited Granite Peak. "We were like, 'If there's ever a snow day for school, we're going to go out and ride,'" said Logan Loeffel, also from Colby. Granite Peak had already been going strong for several weeks, due to their snow-making efforts long before this current wave of fresh powder. "Any snow that we're going to make is not anything compared to what Mother Nature makes. It's still quality snow, but anything that falls from the sky, really, from the clouds that she creates is a lot better," said Greg Fisher, Granite Peak's general manager. Sylvan Tubing Hill had recently undergone a multiple-week closure due to poor snow-making conditions, and has now re-opened because of recent snowfall and lower temperatures. Between the two, neither will need a lot more snow, but consistent weather conditions. "We don't need feet and feet of snow, a couple inches here, a couple inches there goes a long way for the conditions on top of the snow surface that we're grooming," Fisher said. With more snow comes more chances to get downhill, and that's music to several peoples' ears. "All throughout the summer you just talk about going to Granite (Peak) during winter with all the homies, and just getting together for a night ski into the lights. It's just unbelievable," Loeffel said. Fisher says Granite Peak plans to be fully open and done with its snow-making within the next few weeks. Sylvan Hill plans to be open weekends through March. For times, click [here](https://www.canva.com/design/DAFpNEiqJkE/rApIYqA_ok6j0arQU5GZtA/view?fbclid=IwAR3qFACQttey1unphB9hL6m4imFxQu-6EqgVAPlQcDs6-Bf44v8AtUScbLA#26).

author: mobile@rds.ca ()
title: Une exemption spécialement pour Tiger Woods
text: Le conseil d'administration du circuit de la PGA votera la semaine prochaine sur une exemption permanente pour Tiger Woods reconnaissant ses accomplissements pour qu'il puisse prendre part aux évènements signatures du circuit, rapporte Sean Zak de Golf.com. Le plan, conçu sur la base de l'accomplissement de toute une carrière, a été soutenu lors d'une réunion du Conseil consultatif des joueurs le mois dernier et serait mis en œuvre pour la saison prochaine. Le calendrier 2024 de la PGA comprend huit évènements signatures, les cinq derniers de la saison étant joués sans coupure. Les huit évènements cette saison sont le Sentry, le Pro-Am de Pebble Beach, l'Invitation Genenis, l'Invitation Arnold Palmer, le RBC Heritage, le Championnat Wells Fargo, le Memorial et le Championnat Travelers. Pour se qualifier pour un de ces évènements, un joueur doit terminer dans les 50 premiers du classement de la Coupe FedEx de la saison précédente, figurer parmi les 10 premiers joueurs non exemptés du classement actuel de la Coupe FedEx, être vainqueur d'un tournoi de l'année en cours, figurer parmi les 30 premiers joueurs du classement mondial officiel de golf ou bénéficier d'une exemption. Woods n'a participé qu'au Genesis, un tournoi qu'il organise, et s'est retiré après la première ronde en raison d'une grippe plus tôt cette année.

author: David Griffin
title: New Year's Weekend Forecast: More Sunshine Before A Cold Front
text: Friday, December 29th 2023, 10:20 pm As we move into the weekend, we will see more sunshine with gradually warming temperatures. A stronger storm is starting to show up for the weekend after next with rain and snow possible. 50's are likely on Saturday with much lighter wind making for the best day in a while. Another cold front comes in on Sunday and will chill things off again to start the new year. We will also be watching for another storm passing by on Wednesday. Some data brings snow into OKC while other data says we are dry. What is this winter supposed to look like? Watch Chief Meteorologist David Payne's winter weather forecast [here.](https://www.news9.com/story/655584a97f3052056bdc96ae/get-ready-for-snow-david-paynes-winter-weather-forecast-for-oklahoma) What Are The Lake Levels In Oklahoma? To keep track of Oklahoma lake levels, click [here](https://www.lakelevels.info/USA/Oklahoma/). It's important to protect your pipes from the cold. Safety officials recommend protecting outside pipes by disconnecting garden hoses from your house and installing covers on outside faucets. Also, if a sink is along an outside wall of your home, allow a trickle of water to run and open the cabinet doors to allow warm air to circulate. The National Weather Service says when temperatures drop to 28°F or lower for a couple of hours you should bring pets indoors, protect sensitive vegetation, protect outdoor pipes and let indoor faucets drip and to turn off automatic sprinklers. If you're using a space heater, make sure it's not too close to things that can burn like upholstered furniture, clothing, a mattress, or bedding. Never plug a space heater into an extension cord, always plug it directly into a wall outlet. Remember to turn it off before leaving the room or going to bed. Keep it out of the reach of children and pets. Look for signs of malfunctions, especially on older models. Make sure it has an automatic shutoff function. Make sure you have working smoke detectors with fresh batteries. Change the battery twice a year. On average, fires caused by portable heaters cause 65 deaths and 150 injuries a year, according to the US Fire Administration. Overnight on Sunday, firefighters battled several house fires across Oklahoma as temperatures dropped below freezing. Follow the News 9 Meteorologists on Facebook! December 29th, 2023 December 29th, 2023 December 29th, 2023 December 29th, 2023 December 29th, 2023 December 29th, 2023 December 29th, 2023 December 29th, 2023

author: Devdiscourse News Desk
title: Heroic Rescue: SDRF Saves Pregnant Mother Amidst Himachal Floods | Headlines
text:
Heroic Rescue: SDRF Saves Pregnant Mother Amidst Himachal Floods
The State Disaster Response Force in Himachal Pradesh executed a daring evacuation of a pregnant woman from the flood-hit region of Janjehli, Mandi. The operation, spanning difficult terrains and damaged roads, highlights SDRF's commitment. Himachal's Chief Minister assured aid to affected families and reviewed the disaster's impact.
- Country:
- India
In a remarkable rescue mission, the State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) in Himachal Pradesh successfully evacuated a pregnant woman named Mohini from the flood-ravaged Janjehli area of Mandi district. Mohini, married to Desh Raj of Village Road, Jaroh, was transported to Medical College Ner Chowk amid challenging conditions due to inaccessible roads. Her delivery is expected on July 10.
The operation involved a grueling 24-kilometer journey with 14 kilometers covered on foot, illustrating the SDRF's dedication in providing emergency assistance in the affected Seraj region. Himachal Chief Minister Sukhvinder Singh Sukhu visited disaster-stricken areas, including Baga, Syanj, and Panglyur, offering support and condolences to impacted families.
During his visit, the Chief Minister assessed the significant damage caused by recent natural calamities. He expressed the government's commitment to rehabilitation efforts and assured comprehensive relief measures. Tragic losses in Baga and Pangliyur, with lives claimed by flash floods, were met with promises of compensation and ongoing search operations.
(With inputs from agencies.)

author: Dominik Jung
title: Wetter-Prognose kippt: Auf Rekordhitze folgt Frost - konkretes Datum genannt
text:
Wetter-Prognose kippt: Auf Rekordhitze folgt Frost – konkretes Datum genannt
Nach dem ersten Hitzetag 2025 folgt jetzt der Kälteschock – Frost, Regen und Wetterkapriolen erschüttern den Mai. Was kommt als Nächstes?
München – Noch am Freitag (2. Mai) stieg das Thermometer in Waghäusel auf satte 30 Grad – der bisher heißeste Tag des Jahres. Wie die Wetterdaten von wetter.net zeigen, wurde damit der erste Hitzetag 2025 verzeichnet. Doch die Freude über das frühsommerliche Wetter war nur von kurzer Dauer: Bereits am Samstag folgten die angekündigten Unwetter mit kräftigem Starkregen und stürmischen Böen, die regional für schwere Schäden sorgten. Nun steht der Mai vor einer drastischen Kehrtwende – statt T-Shirt-Wetter gibt es jetzt Bodenfrost und fast winterliche Nächte.
Wetter-Prognose kippt: Kommen die Eisheiligen in diesem Jahr zu früh?
Ab Sonntag (4. Mai) zieht sich der Regen langsam in den Süden zurück und ab Montag (5. Mai) stellt sich eine trockenere Wetterlage ein. Das Hoch „Riccarda“ bringt uns zwar wieder stabileres Wetter, jedoch fließt gleichzeitig kältere Luft aus dem Norden ein. Die Temperaturen erreichen tagsüber nur noch 10 bis 18 Grad, in sonnigen Regionen vielleicht 19 Grad – weit entfernt von sommerlichen Spitzenwerten.
In den Nächten drohen empfindliche Tiefstwerte: Im Osten und Nordosten sind bis zu -4 Grad in Bodennähe möglich, stellenweise sogar leichter Luftfrost bis -1 Grad. Ein gefährliches Szenario – besonders für empfindliche Nutzpflanzen wie Tomaten, Gurken, Erdbeeren, Weinreben oder Kartoffeln. In Bayern soll es sogar schneien.
wetter.net - das Wetter auf den Punkt gebracht!
Dieser Artikel entstand in einer Content-Partnerschaft mit wetter.net. wetter.net bietet Ihnen alles Wissenswerte rund um Wetter und Klima. Auf unseren Seiten finden Sie weltweite Stadt- und Ortsprognosen für die nächsten 14 Tage und das für die ersten 7 Tage in 1-stündiger und für die nachfolgenden Tage in 3-stündiger zeitlicher Auflösung. Wettervorhersagen, Niederschlagsradar, Messwerte, Wetterwarnungen, Deutschlandwetter und Wetter-News informieren über die aktuelle Entwicklung sowie die kommenden Stunden und Tage.
Wetter im Mai: Das erwartet uns in der neuen Woche
Der Montag (5. Mai) zeigt sich südlich der Donau bedeckt und regnerisch, besonders an den Alpen teils mit kräftigem Niederschlag – bei einer Schneefallgrenze um 1600 Meter. Im übrigen Land gibt es einen Sonne-Wolken-Mix mit Höchstwerten zwischen 12 und 18 Grad, bei Dauerregen nur 7 bis 11 Grad.
In der Nacht zum Dienstag (6. Mai) kühlt es stark ab, örtlich bis -4 Grad, über der Mitte Frost in Bodennähe. Der Dienstag bringt viele Wolken, aber wenig Regen, und am Mittwoch bleibt es meist trocken, mit Sonne bei maximal 15 bis 20 Grad. Doch Vorsicht: Die Nächte bleiben kritisch, regional droht weiterhin Frost – ein echter Stresstest für Landwirte und Gärtner.

author: Decatur Daily Democrat
title: Beverly Builders Group Unveils Top-Notch Room Addition Services for North Hollywood Residents | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com
text: Beverly Builders Group, a reputable construction company based in North Hollywood, CA, is pleased to announce its top-notch room addition services. With years of experience in the industry, Beverly Builders Group has earned a reputation for delivering excellence in craftsmanship and customer satisfaction. A room addition is an excellent way to expand your living space without the hassle of moving. Whether you need an extra bedroom, a home office, a playroom, or any other type of additional space, Beverly Builders Group has the expertise to bring your vision to life. "Our goal at Beverly Builders Group is to provide our clients with seamless room additions that not only meet but exceed their expectations," said a spokesperson for the company. "We understand that every client has unique needs and preferences, and we work closely with them to create personalized solutions that enhance their living space." Beverly Builders Group offers a comprehensive range of room addition services, including: Design and Planning: Collaborating with clients to create customized room addition designs that seamlessly integrate with the existing structure and complement the overall aesthetics of the home. Permitting and Regulatory Compliance: Handling all necessary permits and ensuring compliance with local building codes and regulations, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free construction process. Construction: Employing a team of skilled craftsmen who use high-quality materials and industry-leading techniques to construct room additions that are built to last. Electrical and Plumbing: Integrating electrical and plumbing systems seamlessly into the new space to ensure functionality and convenience. Interior Finishes: Assisting clients in selecting finishes, such as flooring, paint, and fixtures, that align with their style and preferences. Beverly Builders Group takes pride in its commitment to customer satisfaction. They understand that a room addition is a significant investment, and they strive to deliver exceptional results within the agreed-upon timeline and budget. Their team of experts works diligently to ensure that every aspect of the room addition project is executed with precision and professionalism. For more information about Beverly Builders Group's room addition services or to schedule a consultation, please visit https://beverlybuildersgroup.com/ - https://beverlybuildersgroup.wordpress.com/2023/12/28/press-release-oct-home-remodeling/ or contact us at (818) 724-7744. About Beverly Builders Group: Beverly Builders Group is a renowned construction company based in North Hollywood, CA. With a strong focus on quality craftsmanship and customer satisfaction, Beverly Builders Group specializes in providing top-notch room addition services. They are committed to delivering exceptional results that transform their clients' homes and enhance their living spaces.
